synonyms.synonym: SubName: cDNA FLJ34641 fis, clone KIDNE2016570, highly similar to Homo sapiens dual specificity phosphatase 15 (DUSP15), transcript variant 2, mRNA
Vaccinia virus VH1-related dual-specific protein phosphatase Y
